text:
Good news -> The wonderful people at HubSpot :sprocket:  have a surprise!

All in-person attendees of the Developer Meet Up, will be given a *FREE* INBOUND Community pass! ... WOW!

*Important Note*: These are only for developers attending the Developer Meetup (not for marketers or to give to your colleagues). USE GOOD JUDGEMENT PEOPLE. :slightly_smiling_face:

*Don’t wait - less than 35 spots left!*

Get your free tickets to the Meetup + INBOUND community pass by RSVP’ing here: <https://devday.splashthat.com/>
Anyone happen to have a teleporter handy so I can zip straight from the west coast back home to the east on the third? Stoked to see this event come together! Thanks for all of the effort, folks
<@U7SL518D6> could probably build a teleporter for you - hahah
Does this apply if we watch the live broadcast? In the UK here so no chance of coming along in person :disappointed:
next update of the dev extension <@UDFTHC6PK> :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:
<@UGMGP7A72>  The inbound community pass only applies to in-person attendees, as it would be useless if you’re not even in town
